alert.note: Alert for Barry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 12:32AM CDT until April 21 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1231 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seligman, or 9 miles south of Cassville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Table Rock Lake... Roaring River State Park... Seligman... Washburn... Golden... Emerald Beach... Eagle Rock... Chain-O-Lakes... Arrow Point... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
